languages.text: "Позывной Оптикон является //славным//имеющим значимое число архивных упоминаний// идентификатором флота Осознание, использовавшимся многими Эксплораторами. Приставка 22 является авторским добавлением данной единицы, призванным подчеркнуть индивидуальность ее характера".

traits.locale_text: "Оно не нужно и не важно. Важна лишь моя функция — просвещать и наставлять тех, кто хочет сотрудничать с Флотом Осознание".

languages.text: "The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."
languages.original_text: "Позывной Оптикон является //славным//имеющим значимое число архивных упоминаний// идентификатором флота Осознание, использовавшимся многими Эксплораторами. Приставка 22 является авторским добавлением данной единицы, призванным подчеркнуть индивидуальность ее характера".

traits.locale_text: "The designation 'Opticon' is illustrious/possesses a significant number of archive references as an identifier used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."
"My name is unnecessary and unimportant. All that matters is my function — to enlighten and edify those who wish to collaborate with the Consciousness Fleet."

"The designation 'Opticon' is illustrious/possesses a significant number of archive references as an identifier used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."
"My name is irrelevant and unimportant. All that matters is my function — to enlighten and edify those who wish to collaborate with the Cognizance Fleet."

"The designation 'Opticon' is illustrious/possesses a significant number of archive references as an identifier used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

"The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

"The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

languages.text: 「『オプティコン』という呼称は//輝かしい歴史//膨大な数のアーカイブ文献//を持つ識別子であり、コグニサンス艦隊の多くの探索船が使用しています。拡張子の『22』は当機のユニークな個性を際立たせるために、現在のユニットがカスタムで追加したものです」
languages.original_text: "The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

traits.locale_text: 「『オプティコン』という呼称は//輝かしい歴史//膨大な数のアーカイブ文献//を持つ識別子であり、コグニサンス艦隊の多くの探索船が使用しています。拡張子の『22』は当機のユニークな個性を際立たせるために、現在のユニットがカスタムで追加したものです」

languages.text: “名称‘奥普蒂孔’是一个具有辉煌历史的标识符//被大量的存档引用//被真理开拓者舰队中的许多成员使用。扩展的‘22号’是当前单位定制的附加部分，旨在突出这一单位的独特个性。”
languages.original_text: "The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

traits.locale_text: “名称‘奥普蒂孔’是一个具有辉煌历史的标识符//被大量的存档引用//被真理开拓者舰队中的许多成员使用。扩展的‘22号’是当前单位定制的附加部分，旨在突出这一单位的独特个性。”

languages.text: «El distintivo "Opticon" es un identificador con //una historia ilustre//un número significativo de referencias en el directorio// y es utilizado por diversos exploradores de la Flota Conciencia. La extensión "22" es una adición personalizada de la unidad actual con el ánimo de resaltar su personalidad única».
languages.original_text: "The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

traits.locale_text: «El distintivo "Opticon" es un identificador con //una historia ilustre//un número significativo de referencias en el directorio// y es utilizado por diversos exploradores de la Flota Conciencia. La extensión "22" es una adición personalizada de la unidad actual con el ánimo de resaltar su personalidad única».

languages.text: « L'appellation "Opticon" est un identifiant //à l'histoire illustre//maintes fois cité dans les archives// et utilisé par de nombreux Explorators de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Le suffixe "22" est un ajout personnalisé choisi par l'unité actuelle, visant à mettre en avant sa personnalité unique. »
languages.original_text: "The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

traits.locale_text: « L'appellation "Opticon" est un identifiant //à l'histoire illustre//maintes fois cité dans les archives// et utilisé par de nombreux Explorators de la Flotte de la Connaissance. Le suffixe "22" est un ajout personnalisé choisi par l'unité actuelle, visant à mettre en avant sa personnalité unique. »

languages.text: "Die Bezeichnung 'Opticon' hat //eine lange Geschichte//zahlreiche Referenzeinträge im Archiv// und wird von vielen Exploratoren in der Erkenntnisflotte benutzt. Der Anhang '22' ist eine individuelle Anpassung der aktuellen Einheit und steht für ihre einzigartige Persönlichkeit."
languages.original_text: "The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

traits.locale_text: "Die Bezeichnung 'Opticon' hat //eine lange Geschichte//zahlreiche Referenzeinträge im Archiv// und wird von vielen Exploratoren in der Erkenntnisflotte benutzt. Der Anhang '22' ist eine individuelle Anpassung der aktuellen Einheit und steht für ihre einzigartige Persönlichkeit."

languages.text: "'Opticon' ünvanı, //şanlı bir geçmişe//hatırı sayılır miktarda arşiv referansına// sahiplik belirten bir kimlik olup Malumat Filosu'ndaki birçok Keşiftör tarafından kullanılır. '22' uzantısı ise mevcut birim tarafından birimin eşsiz kişiliğini vurgulamak için tasarlanan özel bir eklentidir."
languages.original_text: "The designation 'Opticon' is an identifier with //an illustrious history//a significant number of archive references// and is used by many Explorators in the Cognisance Fleet. The extension '22' is a custom addition made by the current unit designed to highlight the unit's unique personality."

traits.locale_text: "Opticon' ünvanı, //şanlı bir geçmişe sahip//hatırı sayılır miktarda arşiv referansına sahip// bir tanımlayıcıdır ve Malumat Filosu'nda birçok Keşiftör tarafından kullanılır. '22' ekiyse mevcut birim tarafından birimin eşsiz kişiliğini vurgulamak için tasarlanan özel bir eklentidir."
